Class ClientDriver

java.lang.Object
  ClientDriver

public class ClientDriver
extends java.lang.Object

Framework component that can run on User machines. Provides a command line user interface for Users to submit Job requests and Job status queries. Each Job is identified by the password hash. The Client Driver uses ZooKeeper as lookup service for various operations like adding jobs, getting results etc.

Author:
Hasan Imam
